description: An Advisory sent when a clustered Consumer elected a new leader
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.consumer_leader_elected

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

stream.description: The name of the Stream the Consumer belongs to

consumer.description: The name of the Consumer that elected a new leader

leader.description: The server name of the elected leader

name.description: The server name of the peer

current.description: Indicates if the server is up to date and synchronised

active.description: Nanoseconds since this peer was last seen

offline.description: Indicates the node is considered offline by the group

lag.description: How many uncommitted operations this peer is behind the leader
